Shared.apy-explain: Estimated yearly earnings based on total staked amount and rate reward

Welcome.title: Hats
Welcome.description: We are changing the way security works to fit the culture, nature, and de-facto development processes of Ethereum by incentivizing black hat to become white hat hackers.

TermsAndProcess.pre-submission: Before submitting vulnerability please read the steps and process that your request will go through.
TermsAndProcess.submission:
Your submission will be sent via a bot that is being run by the committee (i) who will process your submission.

The committee of the vault will respond within 12 hours to acknowledge the receipt of submission via the telegram user you provided.
TermsAndProcess.fix: Committee members will check your submission and then reach out to you through the telegram contact you shared with us. They will likely ask for one or both of the following:
TermsAndProcess.fix-question: Questions to help clarify your submission
TermsAndProcess.fix-error: Errors that they have identified in your submission
TermsAndProcess.fix-text-1: Confirmation of the accuracy of your submission and details regarding the solution including:
TermsAndProcess.awards-text-1:
For low-level severity vulnerabilities rewards are likely to be released within 14 days of the validation of your submission.

For medium, high and critical level severity vulnerabilities, rewards will be released within two weeks after the vulnerability has been properly addressed.
TermsAndProcess.awards-text-2: The size of your reward will be based on the decided severity. The severity is decided through the committee within the communicated periods
TermsAndProcess.warning-notice:
PLEASE BE AWARE!

If the vulnerability is exploited prior to the solution being implemented the reward will be voided. As such, please keep all activity in relation to Hats Finance vaults private and confidential.

Submit.review-notice: Please review your request before submitting:
Submit.submit-thanks: Hello new hatter, thank you for your submission!
Submit.submit-complete-text: While waiting, become an active member of our community and let us know what you think.
Submit.response-notice: If you have not received response within 12 hours please contact security@hats.finance in order to check if there is an issue with the bot or the committee.

Airdrop.enter-address: Please enter a wallet address to check your eligibility for the NFT airdrop “The Crow Clan” and the HATS Token airdrop.
Airdrop.not-eligible-nft: This address is not eligible to NFT airdrop
Airdrop.not-eligible-token: This address is not eligible to token airdrop

Protocol.section-1: Hats.finance is a decentralized cybersecurity protocol that allows everyone to add liquidity to bug bounties while farming $HATS.  Hackers can responsibly disclose vulnerabilities without KYC & be rewarded with the highest prize & NFTs for their work.
Protocol.section-2-title: WHERE DOES THE PRIZE COME FROM?
Protocol.section-2: When a hack is happening 100% of your holding is at risk. While a responsible disclosure occurs only % from the % of your stacking is in risk, and you will stay with $HATs tokens. No Token or TVL downside a win-win for everyone involved.
Protocol.section-3-title: WHAT IS MY BENEFIT OF USING HATS
Protocol.section-3:
- Join the effort to secure your favorite  project. 
 - Financial incentive in the form of Yield farming. 
 - Be part of a DeFi cybersecurity protocol. 

 A win-win for everyone involved

ChooseDelegatee.section-1-title: WHAT IS A DELEGATEE AND WHY DO I NEED ONE?
ChooseDelegatee.section-1: Delegation is a shifting of authority and responsibility, e.g. on Hats DAO, voting power from one person to another. The delegatee you choose will represent you on hats future DAO decision. You may choose a delegatee from our list of auditors, dao specialists, security experts or represent yourself
ChooseDelegatee.self-delegatee: I choose myself as a delegatee

Claim.claim-tx-notice: Once you press claim you will be asked to sign for 2 transactions. One time for your delegatee choice and the second for claim transaction.

Success.title: CLAIM SUCCESSFUL!
Success.section-2:
Welcome to the Hats! 

 We encourage you to share on Twitter and join Hats community on Discord to get involved in the governance.
Success.twitter-share-text:
Let me share some crypto alpha. 
 I just received $HAT tokens for my early contribution in @HatsFinance, the first fully decentralized and community owned bug bounty marketplace. 
 Become a chain protector by visiting their dApp or claim tokens if eligible https://app.hats.finance

NFTAirdrop.nft-text: You are eligible to Hats token airdrop and NFT airdrop “The crow clan.

section-1.title: HATS AIRDROP
section-1.text:
Welcome to Hats.finance fisrt airdrop. The airdrop will become live in the next months. 

 Since we don’t want to keep ypu waiting you can check your  eligibliy now and join an embassy

section-2.title: ELIGIBILITY CRITERIA
section-2.text-1: of the projects who are listed on Hats.
section-2.text-2: who added liquidity to one of the vaults (bug bounty) in Hats dApp.
section-2.text-3: will be airdropped as well for their part in creating a community and expanding our reach. We are becoming a big clan!
section-2.text-4: security experts who participate in the Hats game. Hats early supporters - a collective of experts who tested and helped the dev team from day one. We will forever remember your contribution during the early days of developing our vision and core ideas
section-2.text-5: a collective of experts who tested and helped the dev team from day one. We will forever remember your contribution during the early days of developing our vision and core ideas.

section-4.title: JOIN YOUR EMBASSY
section-4.text:
You can access your embassy with your NFT. 

 Each project embassy can send one ambassador to the security council. 

 Only individuals part of an embassy will be able to make governance proposals on protocol changes and the usage of the community treasury for Hats Finance. 

 To be part of a unique group with the project committee. To be the first to learn about security topics related to your protocol.

CheckEligibility.text-1:
Connect your wallet to learn if you are eigible for Hats first airdrop. 

 The airdrop will become live in the next few months.
CheckEligibility.input-placeholder: Connect to wallet or paste a wallet adress

Eligible.title: CONGRATS!
Eligible.text: You are eligible to Hats token and NFT airdrop

TokenEligibility.text-1: Your tokens will be availble when the airdrop becomes live in the next few months.
TokenEligibility.text-12: In order to stay eligible and recieve your token airdrop you must redeem your NFT and use it to join an embassy.
TokenEligibility.text-14: Every project that hosts a decentral bug bounty will form an embassy. Embassies are token gated communities for those that have proof of participating in the security of a project. The access will be managed by a special NFT that can be earned for contributions. Individuals that are either part of the committee that is reviewing disclosed exploits or have deposited into the bug bounty will gain access to their Embassy.

NFTAirdrop.text-1: You are eligible to Hats NFT airdrop - while cool looking the NFT has a utility. Redeem your NFT and use it to enter your embassy.
NFTAirdrop.text-2: Why should I join an embassy?
NFTAirdrop.text-3: Stay eligible and recieve your token airdrop
NFTAirdrop.text-4: Only individuals part of an embassy will be able to make governance proposals on protocol changes and the usage of the community treasury for Hats Finance.
NFTAirdrop.text-5: Be the first to learn about security topics related to your protocol.
NFTAirdrop.text-6: Be part of a unique group with the project committee.

NFTAirdop.eligible-text:
Congratulations on being part of the first Hats NFT airdrop “The Crow’s Clan” Redeem your NFT and join the clan. 

 The crows clan is a one of its kind NFT collection, highlighting the importance of crypto security in a space of constant innovation and change. We chose the crow as the main character of the collection because in many ways crows hold the same values as Hats Finance. 

 The crow is an animal associated with mysteries and magic, often in a negative connotation. However, they also serve an important role in the ecosystem, helping the world get rid of bacteria and restore the forests. The same can be said about Hackers, who are often seen as negative characters, yet they are essential in the crypto ecosystem. 

 Like our early supporters, crows are clever, intelligent, adaptable, with excellent teamwork and reciprocity - exactly what we see in the Hat's community.

Welcome.title: Welcome to the committee tools
Welcome.content-1: The committe tools allow you to easily decrypt vulnerabilities messages submitted by hackers.
Welcome.content-2: In order to decrypt a message you will need to:
Welcome.step-1-content: Create a vault using a password. your password will be used to encrypt the storage.
Welcome.step-3-content: The encryption works with a private and public keys, where the public key is visible to all people and is used to encrypt messages,the private key should be available only to committee members and allows them to decrypt and read the messages.
Welcome.content: We provide you with these tools to allow you to easily decrypt messages received by attackers. You have to createa your vault using a password which will be used to encrypt the storage.
Welcome.create-description: Please create a password for your vault
Welcome.create-addenum: Make sure to save your password in a secure place. Your password can reveal all your private keys, if you lose it, the vault becomes unreadable and may only be deleted.
Welcome.delete-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your vault? type 'yes' to confirm

KeyDetails.title: Key Details
KeyDetails.description: Your private key should be shared with your committee members only via secure chat.

keymodal.intro-text: Please generate a key pair or import a key if you are already holding one
keymodal.title: Generate/import key-Pairs
keymodal.create-text: Create new key and a passphrase
keymodal.import-text: Import a key using your private key & passphrase
keymodal.delete-text: Are you sure you want to delete key-pair?
keymodal.name: Name
keymodal.generate-message: Please generate private and public PGP keys by creating an alias and a passphrase(optional).
keymodal.share-public: Please share your public key with the committee members
keymodal.generated-notice-1:
Please notice! 

 your private key should be shared with your committee members only via secure chat. 

 The public key is used by Hats to encrypt messages from white hat attackers. 

 Please take a minute and send the the public key to
keymodal.generated-notice-2: to be added to Hats json file

Decrypt.decrypt-description: Hello @committee member, Generate or import key-pair in order to decrypt

VaultEditor.title: Vault Editor
VaultEditor.create-vault-description: Please fill the form and sign. Any questions you can refer to @hatsofir.
VaultEditor.signatureMessage: I hereby confirm the details in ipfs hash {{ipfsHash}}.
VaultEditor.pgp-key-description: Please Create A Vault And PGP Key-Pair On Our Dedicated Tool. It will only be stored on the browser's local storage.
VaultEditor.pgp-key-hint-2: Are To Be Generated By The Vault Committee/Signers Only!
VaultEditor.pgp-key-hint-tooltip: The encryption works with a private and public PGP keys, where the public key is visible to all people and is used to encrypt messages. The private key should be available only to committee members and allows them to decrypt and read the messages.

review-vault.title: Review Vault
review-vault.description-1: In order to submit the form for review by hats team.
review-vault.description-2: Complete the transaction by authorized signer/s
review-vault.description-3: You may be asked by the to add dedails to the vault by @hatsOfir
